attributes.action: Cornwall national rugby team/all other sports
attributes.additional_details: Cornwall should have a national rugby/football team because we now have the same recognition and Wales, Scotland and Ireland, we are also getting a 10,000 seater stadium, we have won the county championships twice  in a row, showing we will stand our ground, Iceland has a population of over 100,000 less than Cornwall and look what they achieved! This would be a great moment in Cornwall's history, so all of us Cornish could sit down and be proud of a team and actually support a team! Please share
attributes.background: I'm a young cornish man who wants to have a team to support, now cornwall is a national minority we are meant to have the same rights as Scotland, Wales and Ireland, I'd love to turn my TV on and see cornwall playing national rugby and football! Please share this and help cornwall on its next step!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the football and different sports authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
